tables.name: strain
tables.schema_sql: bacdive_id INT, dsm_number STRING, description STRING, ncbi_taxid STRING, ncbi_taxid_match_level STRING, species_name STRING, strain_designation STRING, type_strain STRING, keywords STRING, doi STRING

tables.name: taxonomy
tables.schema_sql: bacdive_id INT, domain STRING, phylum STRING, tax_class STRING, tax_order STRING, family STRING, genus STRING, species STRING, full_name STRING

tables.name: culture_condition
tables.schema_sql: bacdive_id INT, medium_name STRING, growth STRING, medium_link STRING, temperature STRING, record_type STRING

tables.name: isolation
tables.schema_sql: bacdive_id INT, sample_type STRING, country STRING, continent STRING, geographic_location STRING, cat1 STRING, cat2 STRING, cat3 STRING

tables.name: physiology
tables.schema_sql: bacdive_id INT, gram_stain STRING, cell_shape STRING, motility STRING, oxygen_tolerance STRING, murein_type STRING, predicted_gram STRING, predicted_motility STRING, predicted_oxygen STRING

tables.name: metabolite_utilization
tables.schema_sql: bacdive_id INT, compound_name STRING, chebi_id STRING, utilization STRING

tables.name: sequence_info
tables.schema_sql: bacdive_id INT, accession_type STRING, accession STRING, database STRING, assembly_level STRING, description STRING

tables.name: enzyme
tables.schema_sql: bacdive_id INT, enzyme_name STRING, ec_number STRING, activity STRING
